mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.name FROM attendance a JOIN sem_date s ON a.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE s.id = #{s.id} AND a.club_id = 1 ORDER BY u.id
SELECT DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(a.date,'%Y-%m-%d') date FROM attendance a JOIN sem_date s ON a.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date WHERE s.id = #{s.id} AND club_id = 1 ORDER BY date

SELECT a.id ,a.club_id ,a.check ,a.date ,a.user_id ,s.sem_name ,u.name FROM attendance a JOIN sem_date s ON a.date BETWEEN s.start_date AND s.end_date JOIN user u ON a.user_id = u.id WHERE s.id = #{semId} AND a.club_id = 1 ORDER BY a.date, a.user_id
